title: [Large-scale] Visual Literacy-Based Deepening Education of Mathematical Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and fundamental digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Focuses on applying visual materials (infographics, charts, diagrams, etc.) encountered in daily life to mathematical concept comprehension and problem-solving

learning_goals: Learners can analyze visual materials to derive mathematical relational expressions
Learners can represent mathematical concepts as visual models using digital tools
Learners can interpret visual information encountered in daily life through mathematical logic
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
